channel.title: So many DMCA's!
channel.description:
So wow..it amazes me how many DMCA's are being sent these days. I had put up a new fresh mediafire link for my FR release an hour before I went to bed and it's suspended/deleted now. That's insane that's like less than ten hours and I didn't even give anybody the link!
o_0
Is Jagex really going to cut us down to size by just DMCA'ing us to death/

item.title: So many DMCA's!
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:520438”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=638934.msg4306966#msg4306966 date=1370031323]

[quote author=xI c E link=topic=638934.msg4306963#msg4306963 date=1370030864]

They are going to do whatever it takes to destroy private servers.
[/quote]A few friends have said to me that in the Nederlands that there are no copyright enforcement. Is this true? Could this be a possible solution?

Soulsplit is based there so it could be a reason why they’re still up.

Or that they have a deal with JaGeX?
[/quote]I somehow doubt it. :rolleyes: They would just buy out soulsplit if they wanted to do any business.[/quote]

Why would they buy it out? It is functioning fine, growing, and earning money. Buying it out would be a risky investment because JaGeX have little experience in private servers and there is no need to buy it out. Instead, they simply say “give us … percent of your income, and we wont shut you down” - there is no risk, and they make pure profit with no expenses, where as if they were to buy it out/sue them there is risk involved.

Read full topic

item.title: So many DMCA's!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:520438”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=638934.msg4306966#msg4306966 date=1370031323]

[quote author=xI c E link=topic=638934.msg4306963#msg4306963 date=1370030864]

They are going to do whatever it takes to destroy private servers.
[/quote]A few friends have said to me that in the Nederlands that there are no copyright enforcement. Is this true? Could this be a possible solution?

Soulsplit is based there so it could be a reason why they’re still up.

Or that they have a deal with JaGeX?
[/quote]I somehow doubt it. :rolleyes: They would just buy out soulsplit if they wanted to do any business.[/quote]
I really do think there’s been some form of deal struck up. I mean, soulsplit’s office has an easy 30 computers in it. A company with 30 employees at least that is taking their entire idea and players directly from another game (bearing in mind RS has 400~ employees) is pretty much unheard of.

Read full topic
